div.p: In the left frame all pages of the project are listed. if you select one of them, detailed information on this page is dispayed in the right frame.

td.stdimg: The Pages page of the editor

tr.td: Box No. 1 lists all targets for the current page. If you select a target, you will see it in the Targets page.
Box No. 2 shows all includes used by the current page. With a click on it you will see it in the Includes page.
Box No. 3 contains all images used by the current page. If you want to edit an image, click on it and you will see it in the Images page.
